host_templates._comment:
{FR: Modèle pour superviser les watchers Kadiska via Rest API}

host_templates.alias: Template to monitor Kadiska stations through Rest API
host_templates.name: App-Monitoring-Kadiska-Watcher-Restapi

information.author: Centreon

description.value:
**Plugin-Pack to monitor Kadiska resources through its Rest API.**

Available Host templates and related Services:

|App-Monitoring-Kadiska-Station-Restapi-custom|
|App-Monitoring-Kadiska-Watcher-Restapi-custom|
|---|
|Target-Statistics|
|Watcher-Statistics|

This Plugin-Pack provides two Host discovery *providers* for Kadiska Stations and Watchers, to be used with the Host discovery module.

**Plugin-Pack pour superviser les ressources Kadiska via Rest API.**

Modèles d\'hôtes et de services disponibles avec ce pack:

|App-Monitoring-Kadiska-Station-Restapi-custom|
|App-Monitoring-Kadiska-Watcher-Restapi-custom|
|---|
|Target-Statistics|
|Watcher-Statistics|

Ce Plugin Pack apporte deux fournisseurs de découverte pour les Stations et Watchers Kadiska, à utiliser à l\'aide du module de découverte d\'hôte.

information.monitoring_procedure: # The related documentation is also available online on https://docs.centreon.com/, chapter 'Plugin Packs'
information.name: Kadiska Rest API
